alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:53PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 545 PM MST... At 452 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Apache Lake to 10 miles north of Boyce Thompson Arboretum to Superior. Movement was west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Florence, Superior, Gold Canyon, Gold Camp, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Florence Junction, Queen Valley, Superstition Mountains, Kings Ranch, Boyce Thompson Arboretum and Tortilla Flat. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 199 and 232. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 136 and 150. AZ Route 177 between mile markers 159 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior
